citations.desc: Records: Operators of auction sales and brokers.
citations.narrative:
At time of inspection, there was no acquisition record for the three chinchillas for sale that were acquired via public
surrender. Not having required records for review impedes the inspection process of ensuring animal welfare. Every
broker shall make, keep and maintain records which fully and correctly disclose information concerning each animal
consigned for sale; specifically the name and address of the person who owned the animal for sale and their vehicle
license number, State and driver's license number if they are not licensed or registered under the Animal Welfare Act.
Correct by making and maintaining required acquisition record by 18 July 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.76(a) 
   
Records: Operators of auction sales and brokers. 
At time of inspection, there was no acquisition record for the three chinchillas for sale that were acquired via public 
surrender. Not having required records for review impedes the inspection process of ensuring animal welfare. Every 
broker shall make, keep and maintain records which fully and correctly disclose information concerning each animal 
consigned for sale; specifically the name and address of the person who owned the animal for sale and their vehicle 
license number, State and driver's license number if they are not licensed or registered under the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
Correct by making and maintaining required acquisition record by 18 July 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
